metadata.name: Hugo Limited Edition 01
metadata.description:
Nine Hugos in nine different colors and facial expressions.

A limited edition run of three pieces before the official Hugo mint - owning this piece will give you two additional mint spots for Hugo on mint day. If you're already HugoListed and you end up owning this piece, two more mint spots will be added on to your existing mint spot(s). You can bid on as many pieces as you'd like. There may or may not be an additional surprise down the road for holders of these three pieces ðŸ§¸ðŸ’­
